
## Features ðŸ› 
* MVVM - Architecture
* Dependency Injection with Hilt
* Networking  with Retrofit
* Local Data with RoomDB
* Lottie for animation
* Picasso for image
* Navigation Graph
* Single Activity - Multi Fragment
* Bottom Navigation Bar and Badge
* Filter and Search
* Handling Loading, Success, Error Scenarios
